description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas in pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission ref 241842FUL  dated 07/10/2024 for: Change of use of the ground floor (Use Class E) into 1 self-contained flat (Use Class C3); conversion of first floor and second floor to two self-contained units; creation of a mansard roof level for habitable use; single storey detached garden outbuilding; single storey rear extension; creation of a balcony to the first floor rear elevation; second floor rear extension including the creation of a balcony
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
